406b.text:
The clickRoutines presented in this tutorial execute an equivalent code executed when a widget is clicked.

FLIP and TIMER use exactly the same functions as the cards/basic widgets and timer use when being clicked.

yf2v.text: all these examples for basic widgets can be applied to cards

hvsw.text: you can either use CALL or CLICK to execute another widget's clickRoutine
